headline: AppLovin Stock Showered With Affection On Wall Street
summary: AppLovin stock received price-target hikes from two Wall Street analysts on Friday as it trades at record levels.

headline: AppLovin (APP) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of mobile app technology company AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) jumped 3.9% in the afternoon session after analysts at both UBS and Piper Sandler significantly raised their price targets on the stock.

headline: Trump reaffirms Tylenol claims, AppLovin gets price target lifts
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman outlines some of the top stories of the trading day on Yahoo Finance's Market Minute, including analysts lifting their AppLovin (APP) price targets and the latest on President Trump's Tylenol (KVUE) claims. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: AppLovin Stock Keeps on Climbing. Why It Still Has Room to Rise.
summary: AppLovin stock has been on a tear over the last year, and the mobile technology company isn’t slowing down any time soon, analysts say.  The company, which provides monetization tools to mobile app developers, scored two price-target boosts from Wall Street on Thursday ahead of the soft launch of its self-serve Axon Ads Manager platform next month.  AppLovin  shares were up 2.8% to $658.08 on Friday.
